reviews.review: the game is very hard, but is very cool
super gra polecam włąśnie jestem w trakcie

The developers really managed to create a worthy sequel to Portal. 
New mechanics (light bridges, lasers, transporter beams, etc.) allow for new ways to solve the puzzles.
The story is enjoyable too; I don't want to do spoilers, but Portal 2 deceptively starts just like Portal, then the story unfolds and you find yourself using the portal mechanics to survive in the environment, with multiple twists of the scenario and the story. The game is well paced with dialogue and exploration sequences between the puzzles. Portal 2 has also the same black and surreal humour as Portal -- the scene of the testing for defective turrets is hilarious!
I finished the game in 12 hours without looking for any hint or solution online. The difficulty is well calibrated, with the latest puzzles being very hard but never frustrating. 
Also, the game features a puzzle creator with the possibility of sharing and solving community-created puzzles (yay!), as well as a multiplayer option, which increases a lot game longevity. I haven't played these options, though. 
A must have for any player that likes smart games and problem-solving. Highly recommended.

I don't even know where to start... This game came out in 2011 but stop looking at the date! 
The jokes being made are absulutely genius... 
The plot twists made me scratch my head because I really didn't see them coming...
The concept, just like the first one, is hard but really cool with the expanded fysics.
This game needs to let you think out of the box... LITTERALLY
Overal I'll give this game a 10/10 and a place in my all time favorite games list.
I don't even recommend this, since it's on sale so much... just buy it. just- do please.

两个小时已经是我心目中世上最佳游戏。
第二部相对于第一部的基础上设置了更多的机关，玩家有了更多技巧去通关，地点也不仅局限于实验室，某些关卡视野开阔，这里不作剧透了。总的来说是第一部的全方位升级，更加刺激。哈哈哈这钱花的超值，尤其是最后终于逃出生天的风景！
